forien-copy-environment.title: Import Settings
forien-copy-environment.intro: This form allows you to select which world and player settings you want to import.
forien-copy-environment.message: List generated with Forien's Copy Environment: https://github.com/League-of-Foundry-Developers/foundryvtt-forien-copy-environment
forien-copy-environment.updatedReloading: Updated world settings. Reloading world in 5sec...

import.title: World settings
import.playerList: Import settings for the following players:

import.existingPlayerValues: Existing players that are unchanged and will be skipped:
import.noChanges: There are no differences between the current world and the imported settings.
